comment._content: Financier John W Gates, died in Paris, body brought to NY on Kaiser Wilhelm der Grosse there are a series of NYT articles on his illness and death, died from pneumonia and kidney disease query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=9B03EEDF123AE6...

comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called New York City Undertakers & Funeral Homes, and we'd love to have this added to the group!
